roadmap.name: Learn that you're feelings are yours, nobody can make you feel a certain way. We usually say: “he (or she ) makes me feel…” (fill in the blank), but that’s not what’s happening.
Be a feeling handler instead of a feeling follower. You are responsible for your feelings. Learn to handle your emotions, not let them intimidate you or drag you around on a leash.
Whatever the feeling is, welcome it, then let it go and return to peace and presence until the next wave comes
